::Prowl/Cinder/Mantle/Rubble::

Prowl hangs on tightly to Iron Raptor, half of him listening to her 
and the other half trying to boost his power levels. Shutting off 
some non-crucial systems, like scanners, weapons, and jets, he 
manages to restore his energy to a functional level.

The Maximal barely manages to follow along with Iron Raptor as she 
walks off toward the Cybertronian Fire. What she said about him 
nearly ripping her head off confused him. Everything from the time 
that he was flying after Unicron was a blur, and he couldn't remember 
a thing. The immages that flashed through her mind, however, give 
Prowl a little insight on what he had been doing.

If he had more energy, Prowl might have been sorry for it, though it 
wasn't really his doing, but right now he barely had energy to stay 
conscious.

-Yeah, I think we need to work on that,- he replies to her, -How did 
I get a second beast mode?-
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cinder follows behind Iron Raptor, worry for Prowl written on her 
face. Mantle and the others follow behind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rubble enters the Element, heading for the CR chambers.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked over towards Mantle after he told her that 
they'de 
> recovered a crew member of hers and brought him into a CR chamber.*
> 
> " Thank you."
> 
> * Her attention was drawn towards Prowl as he groans, standing up 
with him 
> in her arms, making sure that he was on his feet so that he 
wouldn't just 
> keel over into the dust.
> She looked into his eyes for a sec to make sure that he was 
alright, her 
> hair falling from her sounders.*
> 
> " Was your second beast mode, hun. I transformed into mine and you 
> automatically TFed into your own. But it took you over and luckily 
Mantle 
> and his crew turned up before you could rip off my head."
> 
> * She smiled at him and gave him a little bit of a squeeze, holding 
tight to 
> make sure that he didn't fall over.
> Iron Raptor looked up at Mantle and the rest of his crew, smiling.*
> 
> " I think you guys'll be a real value here."
> 
> * She gestured towards the CF with her chin.*
> 
> " Why don't we all head in now...."
> 
> * She began to move towards it but very slowly, walking so that 
Prowl could 
> get use to haveing his feet under him again.
> The images of his attack on her flashed in her mind and she did it 
on 
> purpose so that Prowl would know what happened, since thoughts 
could explain 
> things way easier then words.
> < Maybe we should work on that when we have a little time, hmm?> 
she thought 
> to him, smooth and gentle so as not to stress him or anything.
> She didn't hold anything against him, she understood.
> But it was important, if she was ever going to be able to use her 
SBM 
> without worrying about him, that Prowl learned to controle that 
thing.*
> 
> * Iris eyed the crew that Mantle belonged to, staying behind and 
gesturing 
> for them to follow Iron Raptor to the CF.*
>
